def.threejs.three

Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.EventDispatcher
        • def.threejs.three.Object3D
          • def.threejs.three.Light
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbientLight, DirectionalLight, HemisphereLight, PointLight, SpotLight

    public class Light
extends Object3D
    Abstract base class for lights.
